channel.title: I Hate
channel.description:
When you buy an assortment of chip packets and 999 of them are the 'original' or 'plain flavor'. Why the fuck would i want no taste?
This wasn't supposed to be a game starter. Just a vent of frustration.

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

evilkingofpersia:

[quote]I see you could say that, but I disagree. True egalitarianism should treat those that succeed and those that fail as equals, and that they should both have the same rights. Neither has superiority over the other.

An architect who builds an ugly skyscraper which collapses and kills thousands is in all regards to be treated the same as the architect who builds perfectly safe and beautiful structures all the time? Practically, how could supporting failure ever make sense?[/quote]
That’s a reason why communism stresses the need for education so much… so mistakes like that don’t happen. True Marxist communism is unfortunately at this time idealistic… mankind just isn’t ready for it. As technology came about, education for the worker was supposed to go up so that they would be able to operate the technology, however instead the technology was made simpler, and the worker didn’t require more education… which is a reason why Marxist communism probably won’t work, yet. That’s one reason why I’m an anti-revisionist - proven to work, with the right leadership.

Read full topic

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @evilkingofpersia evilkingofpersia
item.description:
@evilkingofpersia wrote:

I see you could say that, but I disagree. True egalitarianism should treat those that succeed and those that fail as equals, and that they should both have the same rights. Neither has superiority over the other.

An architect who builds an ugly skyscraper which collapses and kills thousands is in all regards to be treated the same as the architect who builds perfectly safe and beautiful structures all the time? Practically, how could supporting failure ever make sense?

Read full topic

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

evilkingofpersia:

[quote=“cooper”]I want an egalitarian, classless society while they advocate extreme nationalism and social Darwinism. Our beliefs are very different - communists don’t mix with fascists.

Egalitarianism promotes social Darwinism. Giving everybody an equal chance means that those who succeed have a much more solid basis for their superiority over those who fail because they have had no special opportunities.[/quote]
I see you could say that, but I disagree. True egalitarianism should treat those that succeed and those that fail as equals, and that they should both have the same rights. Neither has superiority over the other.

Read full topic

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:27, topic:269973”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=356339.msg2726464#msg2726464 date=1238375403]

This isnt a bad as your problem but i get pissed off that 7 multipack of Doritos has only 2 chilli-heatwave (which is the best flavour) and 3 packs for the other two shit flavours.

3 + 2 = 5
5 != 7

Alright, so I wasn’t the only one to notice that.
[/quote]

Your the retards but it did make a mistake, but its a different one.

Theres
2x Chilli Heatwave
3x Cool Original
3x Tangy Cheese

So theres 8 packs in a multipack not 5.[/quote]
my the retards?

Read full topic

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @lolcake lolcake_
item.description:
@lolcake wrote:

fat cookies, rather than create vague posts that are very cryptic, i suggest being a little more elaborate. you said there were 3 packs for the other [two] flavors. you did not say that there were 3 packs for each of the other two flavors.

Read full topic

item.title: I Hate
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:20, topic:269973”][quote author=lolcake_ link=topic=356339.msg2726365#msg2726365 date=1238367519]

This isnt a bad as your problem but i get pissed off that 7 multipack of Doritos has only 2 chilli-heatwave (which is the best flavour) and 3 packs for the other two shit flavours.

3 + 2 = 5
5 != 7
[/quote]

Alright, so I wasn’t the only one to notice that. [/quote]

Your the retards but it did make a mistake, but its a different one.

Theres
2x Chilli Heatwave
3x Cool Original
3x Tangy Cheese

So theres 8 packs in a multipack not 5.

Read full topic
